description: Véni Verdi is an initiative, focused on promoting local, social agriculture in urban environments. By establishing gardens on school rooftops, Véni Verdi aims to educate children about the importance of the living world, fostering a connection to nature while addressing climate issues. The initiative engages thousands of children and adults annually, providing access to healthy food and hands-on learning experiences, ultimately empowering future generations to understand and care for their environment.
name: Véni Verdi
